title: Zarrinabad, Lorestan
text: Zarrinabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Zarrīnābād; also known as Jārīābād) is a village in <a href="Qaedrahmat%20Rural%20District">Qaedrahmat Rural District</a>, <a href="Zagheh%20District">Zagheh District</a>, <a href="Khorramabad%20County">Khorramabad County</a>, <a href="Lorestan%20Province">Lorestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 286, in 64 families.
